org.codemonkey.util
Class EncoderUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.codemonkey.util.EncoderUtil

public final class EncoderUtil
extends Object

Helper utility for encoding (integers, strings etc.,lists), using java reflection.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema

Field Detail

VALUE_SEPERATOR

public static final String VALUE_SEPERATOR
Separates the length of a value from its value. Needed to be able to occupy multiply characters for denoting the value's length.

See Also:

EncoderUtil

Method Detail

encode

public static String encode(Object... values)
// FIXME JavaDoc does not reflect function

Combines the length of a given string and the value into a datagram notation. null values are represented as ' "-"'.

Parameters:
values - A list of values to encode in a datagram string.
Returns:
A sequence of encoded values.
See Also:
DatagramEncoder.encode()

encode

public static <T extends DatagramEncoder> String encode(List<T> encoders)
Used to encode a list as a list (containing objects) instead of a collection of individual objects, like encode(Object...) .

Combines the size of a given list and the value into a datagram notation. null values are represented as ' '.

Type Parameters:
T - A DatagramEncoder sub type that can encode itself to a String.
Parameters:
encoders - A list of DatagramEncoder instances to encode in a datagram string.
Returns:
A sequence of encoded integers.
See Also:
DatagramEncoder.encode()

reflectiveEncode

public static String reflectiveEncode(Object subject,
                                      Class<?> boundaryMarkerClass)
Reflectively resolves all fields on the subject which have a getter method of any type of visibility.

The boundaryMarkerClass argument controls how far up the tree we need to go to find fields to include in the encoding. You may use reflectiveEncode(subject, subject.getClass()); to only encode the fields declared by the subject's class itself.

Parameters:
subject - The object on which to invoke field queries.
boundaryMarkerClass - Needed to be able to get fields from super classes of a subject as well if required.
Returns:
A datagram encoded string containing all fields of the boundaryMarkerClass.
